properties.description: Attractive three bedroom semi-detached family home situated within 0.5 miles of Petts Wood station with fast trains to London and within easy walking distance of local shops, schools, bus routes and National Trust woodland. The property comprises; two receptions, fitted 18'9 x 10'1 kitchen/breakfast room and conservatory. The property also benefits from having a utility room and cloakroom. To the first floor there are three bedrooms and a family bathroom with separate WC. Additional features include double glazing, gas central heating and a well presented interior...
properties.location: Petts Wood Road, Petts Wood, Orpington BR5

properties.description:
Presented in excellent decorative order throughout is this two double bedroom, two bathroom, garden flat.
The modern fitted kitchen is open plan to the living room which boasts solid wooden floors and includes integrated appliances including a dishwasher & a washing machine. This large open plan benefits from bi folding doors onto a secluded private courtyard garden. Both bedrooms are double sized, and the family bathroom boasts a matching three piece suite a shower attachment over the bath. There is also a separate wet room. There are walnut doors throughout and wiring for Sky TV/aerial points in the living room/kitchen and both bedrooms.
This apartment being only five years old, is still under a 10 year building guarantee...
A compact but bright top floor flat with an excellent outlook over Green Park in this very central location within an easy walk of the City centre.
One room in a furnished student house share located in Combe Down. Available now.

A fully furnished double bedroom within an elegant and beautifully presented four storey georgian townhouse. The entire home offers eleven well proportioned double rooms, and is perfectly suited to students. Devonshire Buildings is ideally situated off Wells Road in the sought after and convenient Bear Flat location. This lovely home also benefits from a private laid to lawn garden accessed opposite the house. Stepping through the front door through to the ground floor, the grand hallway will provide you with access to three bedrooms, a W/C and bathroom. Following the character staircase up to the first floor, there are a further two bedrooms, a kitchen, and living room which leads through to a bath/shower room. The second floor offers a further three bedrooms and more kitchen space. Ascending to the top floor, you are greeted by the final three bedrooms with far reaching views, and a final shower room.

Willmotts brings this for you, Smart and stylish 2 bedroom ground floor garden flat, this property has been completely refurbished to very good standard and benefits from new kitchen, new bathroom, new carpets and flooring, new decorations through out and private rear garden. The apartment is part of established period property on quiet residential tree lined street. Located close to Belsize Park and Hampstead Heath Tube, Royal free Hospital and many shops and amenities.
